DOC.brief_summary: The first purpose randomize control trial test efficacy 24-session , 6-month family-based behavioral intervention ( FBBI ) - compare delayed treatment group later receive FBBI - target weight loss adolescents/young adult intellectual disability age 15-22 year . The second purpose randomize controlled trial examine efficacy 12-session , 6-month Maintenance intervention target maintenance weight loss population adolescents/young adult intellectual disability . The Maintenance condition follow completion FBBI group involve re-randomization either Maintenance intervention intervention . Outcome measure include Body Mass Index ( BMI ) , waist circumference , physical activity/sedentary behavior ( measure via accelerometry ) , dietary pattern ( 3-Day Food Records ) , self-efficacy psychosocial characteristic ( Adolescent Depression Anxiety Scale ) . Hypotheses ( 1 ) participant FBBI condition lose weight ( reduced BMI ) participant delay treatment condition , ( 2 ) participant Maintenance condition maintain weight lose ( reduction BMI ) experience less weight regain , compare participant receive intervention follow FBBI .
